DOC.brief_summary: This prospective observational study collect outcome data patient choose undergo transoral tongue base operation Obstructive Sleep Apnea Hypopnea Syndrome ( OSAHS ) part standard care treatment . This data collection study provide evaluation treatment OSAHS .
